snippet: Why do you think child stars are so prone to public “meltdowns”? Or do you think they are only acting the way any young adult might, except in the very public eye?
abstract: Why do you think child stars are so prone to public “meltdowns”? Or do you think they are only acting the way any young adult might, except in the very public eye?

headline.main: Do You Think Child Stars Have It Rough?
